where.label: WR2
where.expression: SIZEOF (QUERY (pd <* USEDIN (SELF, 'PACKAGED_CONNECTOR_MODEL_MIM.' + 'PROPERTY_DEFINITION.DEFINITION') | (SIZEOF (QUERY (sa <* USEDIN (pd, 'PACKAGED_CONNECTOR_MODEL_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT.OF_SHAPE') | (SIZEOF (QUERY ( sar <* USEDIN(sa, 'PACKAGED_CONNECTOR_MODEL_MIM.' + 'SHAPE_ASPECT_RELATIONSHIP.RELATED_SHAPE_ASPECT') | sar\shape_aspect_relationship.name = 'interface plane')) = 1) )) = 1) ) ) <= 1

rule.name: packaged_connector_terminal_relationship_unique_constraint
